title: BRIEF-China National Software & Service to invest in stake in communication tech firm
text:
BRIEF-China National Software & Service to invest in stake in communication tech firm Sept 10 
Sept 10 China National Software & Service Co Ltd 
* Says plans to invest 151.2 million yuan ($23.71 million) in communication technology firm for 32.4 percent stake 
* Says trading of shares to resume on Sept 11 
Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/1NjNapa ; bit.ly/1JYq6Kl 
Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.3770 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong and Singapore newsrooms) Trending On Reuters
